input_email_body:
Subject: Report of a Medical Data Breach

Attention Customer Support, a potential medical data breach has been identified, with unauthorized access suspected. The breach could be due to inadequate encryption and legacy software vulnerabilities You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. So far, steps like network isolation and password resets have been taken; however, the problem continues and needs urgent resolution. Please launch an investigation and outline a strategy to avert future breaches and safeguard sensitive medical information. My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.
